# Description

I'm professor and academic director at the Institute for Housing and Urban Development Studies, which is part of Erasmus University Rotterdam. My research interests include policy evaluation (especially when it comes to infrastructure projects and programs), research methods and the complexity sciences.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot}

member_name <- "Lasse Gerrits"
special_skill <- "heavy metal guitar"

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", "open source software", "data sharing", "data management", all_of(special_skill), "open access", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
